text: Emily Michot is an American journalist. She won a Sidney Award, Goldsmith Prize for Investigative Reporting, Esserman-Knight Journalism Prize, and the 2019 Anthony Shadid Award. She is a videographer for the Miami Herald. She has been nominated for the Pulitzer Prize. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American journalists
title: Emily Michot
